H0.text: Mechanical energy is produced when two objects move together.

H1.text: Internal energy is produced when two objects move together.

H2.text: Kinetic energy is the type of energy produced when two objects move together.

H3.text: Fluid is the type of energy produced when two objects move together.

A4.text: In the game of billiards, the player imposes kinetic energy on the cue ball by striking it with the cue stick.
